copy:
I’m a Toronto-based art director and designer focused on digital designs, branding strategy, and social media management. I'm a visual story-teller and have a penchant for simply designed things.

I graduated from Humber College’s advertising and design program but also have a Bachelor’s degree in linguistics from the University of Waterloo.

Want to know more? Have more questions? Freelance inquiries? Say what’s up at wendylaurala@gmail.com
